Uses of Class
com.tiyb.tev.datamodel.Answer

  • Packages that use Answer 
    Package Description
    com.tiyb.tev.controller
    This package contains Controllers for the application (both REST and UI).
    com.tiyb.tev.datamodel
    This package contains the Entity classes for working with data in the DB.
    com.tiyb.tev.xml
    This package contains classes related to the parsing of XML documents.
